column19: Comments

%crops the continuous data before preprocessing. Trials= from first to last trial; x,y= x seconds from beginning to y seconds to the end (e.g. 180,20)
%higphass filter in hz (bandpass edge; cut-off frequency is different (for 1 Hz it is 0.5 Hz))
%lowpassfilter in hz (bandpass edge; Cut-off frequency is different)
%linenoise removal around hz
%0 = no notch filter; 1 = IIR notch filter (-5 < frequency > +5 Hz)
%start epoch in ms
%end epoch in ms
%%if trial rejection automatic: rejection threshold in µV
%%0= nor re-referencing, 1 = avg reference, otherwise: it references to that channel (ex. FP1)
%%5=very strict, 30=very liberal, 19=good choice
%%baseline length for inverse model and bootstraping
%%how much do you want to downsample the sources

point, 3: every third etc)

point, 3: every third etc)
